author: Rezyn
description: Backfill all Discord guild channels with historic messages to Grafana Loki.
install_msg: Backfill cog loaded. Use [p]lokibackfillall [limit] to start backfilling all channels to Loki.
name: LokiBackfill
end_user_data_statement: This cog reads message history and exports it to a configured Loki endpoint. No data is stored locally.
